message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and uniqueness.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20000 is way out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product but I can't go higher than $8000.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but $8000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $18000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm firm on my offer of $8000.  Let me know if you're willing to accept it.

Hi Bob, I understand that $18000 is still a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $14000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
